fields.summary: Create manual regression test cases. Client profitability Report

issuetype.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a Tester I want to easily find all necessary test cases so that I can plan and execute regression testing.

Problem statement: Some test cases don't exist, some are out of date, some are duplicated, there are too many of test cases and hard to find what we have/don't have and what needs to be tested per given story/sprint/release.

Outcomes: 
 Manual test cases created to cover Ignitia regression testing. 
 Corresponding priorities are set on test cases. So that in future, if we don't have much time to execute all tests, we focus only critical and high. 
If automation test case exist ->link to manual test.
 Find all other test cases related to this functionality > Retire (where applicable), or mark them "Regression = No"
 Place all test cases "Regression = Yes" in corresponding test suite or under filter (if you want to bring few test suites under one roof) 
 Update confluence with link to test suite: [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Test+Suites+and+Test+Cases] 
 Refer to this page for more guidelines (in some cases) [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Automation+Coverage+for+Critical+Functionality] 
 All bugs found on the way to be logged (functional, performance, UX etc)

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
status.name: In Progress

fields.summary: Create st-test cases for Client invoice - Adding creative items

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Create st-test case tickets for Client invoice - adding Creative items (by job, estimate, cost type, etc.) within the Client invoice test suite GBP-32303.

Ensure Components, Labels, Team, Regression item and Automated fields are filled in correctly, and automated test cases are linked if applicable.
 * Component: Client invoice
 * Labels: Client_invoice; Media*; Creative**
 * Team: GBP Alpha

*If test applies to Media or Media + Creative tenant

**If test applies to Creative or Media + Creative tenant

fields.summary: Media estimates management
fields.description:
This test suite is a collection of test cases to validate below functionality:
 * The estimate page displays active and closed estimates ( estimates) that you have permission to view. The page default view displays open / active estimates.
 * You can filter the estimate list by: Booking client, Brand, Campaign, Client brief number, Created before, Created after, Modified before, and Modified after dates.
 * To successfully manage a estimate you use data from various master data files held within Client organization, Vendor organization, Job/media type, Spot attributes, and Foreign currency groups.
 * The estimate is a single or a collection of media bookings for a one—client, brand, and campaign.
 * The estimate can comprise multiple media outlets, and vendors.

 Corresponding priorities are set on test cases. So that in future, if we don't have much time to execute all tests, we focus only critical and high. 
If automation test case exist ->link to manual test.
 Find all other test cases related to this functionality > Retire (where applicable), or mark them "Regression = No"
 Place all test cases "Regression = Yes" in corresponding test suite or under filter (if you want to bring few test suites under one roof) 
 Update confluence with link to test suite: [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Test+Suites+and+Test+Cases] 
 Refer to this page for more guidelines (in some cases) [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Automation+Coverage+for+Critical+Functionality] 
 All bugs found on the way to be logged (functional, performance, UX etc)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

Manual test cases created to cover Ignitia regression testing. 
Corresponding priorities are set on test cases. So that in future, if we don't have much time to execute all tests, we focus only critical and high.
